name: Quill-Image-Uploader
description: A quilljs plugin that uploads images inserted, drag/dropped or pasted into the quill editor to a server instead of being base64 encoded.

description: A blog app that shares useful tips to other developers. It has dark/light mode theme, a rich text editor made with QuillJS, google oauth2 login and regular email/password login

name: Blog App API
description: This is a laravel API for my Vue Blog app. It has session based authentication for only my SPA, it has automated tests with PestPHP. It also has two types of users, Admin and guest. Admin has full admin abilities while guests are only allowed to view resources.

name: Portfolio API
description: API to manage projects in my portfolio website with JWT auth and mongodb

description: An API for a Book Library

description: Landing page for a Fintech's Dashboard. Open on Desktop!
